title: Chicken nuggets with smoked paprika and anchovy mayo
description: These homemade chicken nuggets are posh people-pleasers. Serve as a moreish canapé at your next party.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor.
ingredients: vegetable or sunflower oil, for deep-frying
200g/7oz semolina flour, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz tapioca flour (available online or from health-food specialists)
4 skinless chicken breasts, cut into nugget-sized pieces
